snippet: A professor developed a measure for sarcasm by Supreme Court members, and Justice Antonin Scalia dwarfed the showings of every justice he has served with.
abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column points out Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia, with his acerbic tongue and cutting writing style, is most sarcastic member of court by far; notes University of California, Irvine, Prof Richard L Hasen developed sarcasm index with Scalia scoring 2.78, and next justice rating only 0.43.
lead_paragraph: A professor developed a measure for sarcasm by Supreme Court members, and Justice Antonin Scalia dwarfed the showings of every justice he has served with.

headline.main: Scalia Lands at Top of Sarcasm Index of Justices. Shocking.
